<Text: The Boise State–Nevada football rivalry is a college football rivalry between the Boise State Broncos football team of Boise State University and Nevada Wolf Pack football team of University of Nevada, Reno.>

Text: Boise State–Nevada football rivalry:  The game has been played every year since 1971 with the exception of 1978, 1992, 1995, 2000, 2015 and 2016.

Text: Boise State–Nevada football rivalry:  The game was also played twice in 1990 as the second game was a Division I-AA semifinal playoff game, and to date has been the only post-season game played between the two programs.
